text: We may also disclose your personal data, to the extent necessary, to app stores or platforms (such as the Apple App Store and Google Play Store) if that is required or in order to investigate or prevent fraud.

We may also disclose your personal data, to the extent necessary, to app stores or platforms (such as the Apple App Store and Google Play Store) if that is required or in order to investigate or prevent fraud.

Such platforms and stores may also process your information in order to provide you with cross-device access to the App.
We may also disclose your personal data, to the extent necessary, to app stores or platforms (such as the Apple App Store and Google Play Store) if that is required or in order to investigate or prevent fraud.
Such platforms and stores may also process your information in order to provide you with cross-device access to the App.

We may collect this data so that we can understand usage of our App, analyse and improve our App and develop new services or new parts thereof.
We may process your data to make suggestions and recommendations to you and other users of our Services about: (i) news and updates relating to us, our partners, products, services and content; (ii) content, goods and services that may interest you; and (iii) other promotional activity and events we think may be of interest.
We process this information on the basis of our legitimate interests to understand how visitors use our Website and to compile statistical reports regarding that activity (for example, your IP address is used to approximate the country from which you access our Website, and we aggregate this information together so we know that, for example, most of the visitors to our Website are in England).
how we collect and use your personal data : The table below explains what data we collect, how we use it, and which recipients it might be shared with.
We may use any aggregated data derived from or incorporating your personal data but not in any manner that would identify you personally.

Attribution information enables us to promote the success of our company by better understanding the comparative successes of our marketing and our partners' efforts, so that we can be more efficient with our marketing and our arrangements with partners.
We process this information on the basis of our legitimate interests, being our interests to promote the success of our company.

Where this processing requires consent to the use of cookies or similar technologies, we process this information on the basis of consent.
Where this processing requires consent to the use of cookies or similar technologies, we process this information the basis of consent.
We may share data about you with third party providers of attribution services (based outside of the UK and EEA).
We may share data about you with third party analytics services providers (based outside of the UK and EEA).
We may share you data about you with third party providers of marketing automation platforms and email marketing services (based outside of the UK and EEA).
We may share data about you with third party operators of social networks (based outside of the UK and EEA).

Data Retention : We will only hold data about you for as long as necessary, bearing in mind the purpose for which that data was collected, or as otherwise described in this Policy.
